mapper.select: select id, title, content, begin_date, end_date, active from oskari_announcements where begin_date <= #{beginDate} ::DATE AND end_date >= #{endDate} ::DATE order by id desc
select id, title, content, begin_date, end_date, active from oskari_announcements order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into oskari_announcements(title, content, begin_date, end_date, active) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{begin_date}, #{end_date}, #{active}) returning id
mapper.update: update oskari_announcements set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, begin_date = #{begin_date}, end_date = #{end_date}, active = #{active} where id = #{id} returning id
mapper.delete: delete from oskari_announcements where id = #{id} returning id
